itemInfo.itemDesc:
A grain dough baked with cheese inside. 

- Unique Effect: Restore +7 Worker Stamina (Use through the Worker Menu on the world map)

- How to Obtain: It can be Cooked at your House.

- Cooldown: 1 sec

item.name: Cheese
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. This can be created by Drying milk received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fish Filet Salad, Cheese Gratin, etc.

item.name: Cheese
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. This can be created by Drying milk received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Fish Filet Salad, Cheese Gratin, etc.

item.name: Egg
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be received from a farm Quest.\n\n- Usage: Soft Bread, Omelet, etc.

item.name: Wheat Dough
item.desc:
A product made by Shaking Wheat Flour obtained through Grinding together with Mineral Water purchased at a Shop.
- How to Obtain: It can be obtained through Shaking.

- Usage: Exotic Herbal Wine, Soft Bread, Meat Pasta, etc.

item.name: Butter
item.desc: An ingredient used in Cooking. It can be created by Shaking salt with the cream obtained from Shaking milk.\n\n- Usage: Cheese Pie, Seafood Grilled with Butter
